definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Finally some suggestions were proposed to perfect tourist interpretation of Cuihuashan National Geopark.
sentences.chinese: 最後提出了翠華山景區旅遊解說完善的建議。

sentences.english: It is a well written gatha with an excellent explanation.
sentences.chinese: 此篇連同解說都寫得極出色。

sentences.english: Alas, there’s no audio commentary so the offside rule remains a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 唉，因爲沒有現場語音解說，越位判定仍然是一個謎。

sentences.english: Also, Rowling described the Luna-commentated match as "the last Quidditch match."
sentences.chinese: 而且羅琳會描寫盧娜解說“魁地奇的最後一戰”。

sentences.english: Voice commentary for a TV-like broadcast of the match.
sentences.chinese: 語音解說了本場比賽類似電視的播出。

sentences.english: It is undefinable as a passion.
sentences.chinese: 它作爲一種激情是無法加以解說的。

sentences.english: Your smile. my love, like the smile of a strange flower, is simple and inexplicable.
sentences.chinese: 我的愛，你的微笑像一朵奇花的曳樸素而不可解說。

sentences.english: The other narrative of social dilemmas is The Tragedy of the Commons.
sentences.chinese: 另一個關於社會困境的解說就是“公共品悲劇”。

sentences.english: At the wedding ceremony, sports narrator Han Qiaosheng holds the post of the director.
sentences.chinese: 婚禮上，著名體育解說員韓喬生擔任主持人。

sentences.english: The tour guide gave a running commentary from the front of the coach .
sentences.chinese: 導遊在旅遊車的前部向遊客作連續的現場解說。

sentences.english: However, the explanation for deliberately hurting the person you love is far more complex.
sentences.chinese: 然而，對故意傷害你愛的人的解說要複雜的多。

sentences.english: Silk Manuscripts explanation of whether the suffix up to?
sentences.chinese: 帛書的解說是否後綴上去的？

sentences.english: When you explain your decision, the interview can easily follow your thought process.
sentences.chinese: 當你解說你答案時，面試官可以輕易跟隨你的思路。

sentences.english: Combined with examples to explain the characteristics of network diskless.
sentences.chinese: 再分離實例來解說無盤收集地各類特性。

sentences.english: An electronic unit for two commentators enabling them to announce live from the commentary position .
sentences.chinese: 在評論席桌上專爲二位解說員設定的特別播音儀器。

sentences.english: I told this to the magicians, but none could explain it to me.
sentences.chinese: 我將這夢告訴了術士，卻沒有人能給我解說。

definition: to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
